name: Jasce of the Dark: Jet Panic
name_original: Jasce of the Dark: Jet Panic
description:
Fly, dodge and shoot your way through the sky's taking down enemy jets as you try to survive to make it to the tunnel. Can you make it to the tunnel in time before being killed?

Gameplay: 

Green rings heal you

Score for each enemy killed

Controls: 

W,A,S,D to move around the screen

Left mouse click to shoot

Escape key to pause
